tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_type_of_assistance AS SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, val.category_value AS terms_assist_name, val.id AS terms_assist_code FROM ((amp_funding_pledges p JOIN amp_funding_pledges_details fund ON ((p.id = fund.pledge_id))) JOIN amp_category_value val ON ((fund.type_of_assistance = val.id))) GROUP BY p.id, val.id, val.category_value ORDER BY p.id, val.category_value;;;
